transcripts.text: Welcome back to the Thayer 2020 Immigration Town Hall.  This virtual town hall is calling people across America and hearing their questions and concerns about how the global crisis is affecting them.  We go next to Philadelphia.  Go ahead, please.
You know, I work hard and just got laid off my job and I don't have health care insurance.
I'm sorry to hear that.  What's your question for our other viewers?
Why is it fair to cover health care costs for foreign nationals when there are millions of uninsured Americans like me?
